TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool Predicate<in T>(T obj);
.class public auto ansi sealed Predicate`1<- T> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function Predicate(Of In T)(obj As T) As Boolean
generic <typename T> public delegate bool Predicate(T obj);

span.span: The type of the object to compare.

param.name: obj
param.span: 要比較的物件，根據這個委派表示方法中所定義的準則。

span.span: The object to compare against the criteria defined within the method represented by this delegate.

summary.span: 代表定義一組準則的方法，並判斷指定的物件是否符合這些準則。

span.span: Represents the method that defines a set of criteria and determines whether the specified object meets those criteria.

returns.span: 如果 符合這個委派表示方法中所定義的準則，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if meets the criteria defined within the method represented by this delegate; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委派由數個方法和来搜尋項目集合中的類別。This delegate is used by several methods of the and classes to search for elements in the collection. 一般而言，委派由 lambda 運算式。Typically, the delegate is represented by a lambda expression. 本機範圍的變數可用於 lambda 運算式，因為很容易就能測試精確不是在編譯時期已知的條件。Because locally scoped variables are available to the lambda expression, it is easy to test for a condition that is not precisely known at compile time. 這在下列範例中，它會定義模擬`HockeyTeam`包含國家 （地區) Hockey League 小組和年成立的相關資訊的類別。This is simulated in the following example, which defines a `HockeyTeam` class that contains information about a National Hockey League team and the year in which it was founded. 這個範例定義的整數值，表示年來，陣列，會隨機指派到陣列的一個項目`foundedBeforeYear`，這是在本機的範圍是此範例的變數`Main`方法。The example defines an array of integer values that represent years, and randomly assigns one element of the array to `foundedBeforeYear`, which is a variable that is locally scoped to the example's `Main` method. 本機範圍的變數可用於 lambda 運算式，因為 lambda 運算式傳遞至方法是能夠傳回`HockeyTeam`上或該年份的前所建構的每個小組的物件。Because locally scoped variables are available to a lambda expression, the lambda expression passed to the method is able to return a `HockeyTeam` object for each team founded on or before that year. [!code-csharp[System.Predicate\`1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/cs/predicate1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Predicate\`1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/vb/predicate1.vb#3)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用委派與方法來搜尋的陣列結構。The following code example uses a delegate with the method to search an array of structures. 此範例會明確地定義委派名為`predicate`並將其指派方法，名為`FindPoints`傳回`true`如果的產品和欄位大於 100000。The example explicitly defines a delegate named `predicate` and assigns it a method named `FindPoints` that returns `true` if the product of the and fields is greater than 100,000. 請注意，您可使用 lambda 運算式而不是明確定義之類型的委派，如第二個範例所示。Note that it is customary to use a lambda expression rather than to explicitly define a delegate of type , as the second example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.Predicate\`1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/cs/predicateex2.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Predicate\`1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/vb/predicateex2.vb#4)] 下列範例等同於上述範例中，不同之處在於它使用 lambda 運算式來代表委派。The following example is identical to the previous example, except that it uses a lambda expression to represent the delegate. 每個項目`points`陣列會傳遞至 lambda 運算式，直到運算式尋找符合搜尋準則的項目。Each element of the `points` array is passed to the lambda expression until the expression finds an element that meets the search criteria. 在此情況下，lambda 運算式傳回`true`產品 X 和 Y 欄位是否大於 100000。In this case, the lambda expression returns `true` if the product of the X and Y fields is greater than 100,000. [!code-csharp[System.Predicate\`1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/cs/predicateex1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Predicate\`1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/vb/predicateex1.vb#2)]
